short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This new tab extension will show pictures of cars in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cars Background pictures extension shows pictures of various vehicles when a new tab is opened. Those stunning background pictures of different cars will be displayed with every new tab you open.

Please note this extension will change your Chrome New Tab and New Tab search. 
New Tab search results powered by Yahoo.

Here are some important details:

By selecting the 'Add to Chrome' button and installing this amazing 'Cars background pictures New Tab' you are consenting to the installation of this extension, along with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service stated below. 
By installing the 'Cars background pictures New Tab,' you are agreeing to the modification of the new tab settings. 
You have the option to remove or disable this extension whenever you wish. 
Privacy policy available at: https://carsbackgroundpicturesnewtab.com/privacy.html
Terms of Service: https://carsbackgroundpicturesnewtab.com/terms.html

Feel free to contact us at support@carsbackgroundpicturesnewtab.com. We would be delighted to assist you!
